content.en: Brachytherapy Algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the feasibility and effectiveness of various algorithms in the field of cervical cancer brachytherapy. These algorithms, such as the Hybrid Inverse treatment Planning and Optimization (HIPO) algorithm and the Inverse Planning Simulated Annealing (IPSA) algorithm, are used for inverse planning and optimization of treatment plans. The studies compare different algorithms and evaluate their impact on treatment planning and dose calculation, aiming to improve the quality and precision of brachytherapy for cervical cancer patients.
content.da: Brachyterapi-algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt gennemførligheden og effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer inden for brachyterapi til livmoderhalskræft. Disse algoritmer, såsom Hybrid Inverse treatment Planning and Optimization (HIPO) algoritmen og Inverse Planning Simulated Annealing (IPSA) algoritmen, bruges til omvendt planlægning og optimering af behandlingsplaner. Studierne sammenligner forskellige algoritmer og vurderer deres indvirkning på behandlingsplanlægning og dosisberegning med det formål at forbedre kvaliteten og præcisionen af brachyterapi for patienter med livmoderhalskræft.
